thread.title: Joe C.
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Joe C.

author: Joe C.
title: Joe C.
text: In my experiences with the Waco Home Zone staff, they have always been friendly, attentive, and knowledgeable about their products and services. Home Zone has the best prices in Waco. The store could really benefit from more advertising though. Many people that I have talked to have no knowledge of Home Zone existing in Waco, or what great sales and tent sales they have. Great job!!
